title: Madurai, the temple city
description: Madurai is a city in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It is the administrative headquarters of the Madurai district and serves as the commercial hub of the Madurai division. It is located on the banks of the river Vaigai. Madurai is known as the cultural capital of Tamil Nadu.

title: Chennai, the capital of Tamil Nadu
description: Chennai is the capital of the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. It is the largest cultural, economic and educational centre of south India. It is also the home of the Tamil film industry, known as Kollywood.

title: Mumbai, the city of dreams
description: Mumbai Meri jaan. House of Bollywood.
